Description: Rim and body sherd of Chian pottery Ionian cup with everted rim; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky brown-black below; two faded added white bands at junction of rim and bowl; exterior: lip glazed, handle zone reserved; glazed below. Inscription on inside.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1915) (phase 2)
Williams 2006a / The Chian Pottery from Naukratis (p. 132 note 63)
